number.description: Unique number assigned by you or if empty SK product number schema.

tag_list.description: Space separated list of tags. Are split and saved as Tag objects on create, update.

price.description: Net price of a single product. Max 6 decimal places.

cost.description: Cost price of a single product. Max 6 decimal places.

category_name.description: Name of the product category. A new category is created if it does not exist.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

lock_version.description: Increased on every edit, so SK can detect/prevent a concurrent edit by another user. First save wins.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 50, max is 200

filter[q].title: Search
filter[q].description: Wildcard search in number, name, description, price

filter[contact_ids].title: Contact IDs
filter[contact_ids].description: Comma-separated list of contact IDs. While present, it will return payments related to all contacts' documents.

filter[tags].title: Tags
filter[tags].description: Filter by a space delimited list of tags

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
